item.description:
Update: Not sure which day this will be. Depends on other people's schedules. I 'm leaning towards Saturday now.

Crow Hill is likely the best climbing in MA. Plenty of routes and a 90 foot tall wall in spots. You can lead here too (at your own risk.)

Sorry - not a newbie climb this weekend. You should know how to set up your own rope (I can lend a rope and slings.)

Please bring a helmet if you have one.
Also, there are no facilities. Bring water, food, camera, etc. Rain cancels. Be prepared for cold and chilly conditions.

If you need a ride, contact me for car pooling at 9:30 AM sharp at Porter Square. My cell phone: 617 501-6217

Directions to Crow Hill. (Leominster State Park)
http://www.mass.gov/d....
Take route 2 to rt 31 south (exit 28) go south 1.3 miles to park head quarters. (get free climbing permit.) There are two parking lots. Go to the second parking lot on the left. You will see picnic tables. Lets meet in the parking lot at 11am.

Geoff 617 501-6217


See you there!
item.name: Crow Hill, Sunday (Or maybe Saturday) Nov 11th. 11AM
